assignments.description: Sets recordId with value from contactId

decisions.description: contactId variable is populated through LWC on JEDI Overview page.
decisions.name: Is_contactId_Null
decisions.label: Is contactId Null?

decisions.description: Checks recordId prefix to see if the Screen Flow was spawned from a Constituent (003) or Organization (001)
decisions.name: recordId_is_Constituent_or_Organization
decisions.label: recordId is Constituent or Organization?

Flow.description: Custom screen flow that provides a more streamlined method of submitting a Contact Report as well as a solution to issues with the ascend Contact Report form on mobile.

formulas.description: Gets contact or org name depending on what's not null
formulas.name: RecordName

formulas.description: If create contact report account record Id is null, use create contact report contact record Id
formulas.name: RelatedId

formulas.description: Sets the default task due date to 2 weeks after the Date of Contact
formulas.name: taskDueDateDefault

formulas.description: A formula that calculates the value to be used for the Task status.
formulas.name: TaskStatus

Flow.interviewLabel: Contact Report - Create New Contact Report (Gift Officers) {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}

recordCreates.name: Create_Event_Related_to_Contact_Report

recordLookups.description: Gets Contact to grab fields from recordId

recordLookups.label: Get Contact

recordLookups.description: Gets Org to grab fields from recordId
recordLookups.name: Get_Organization
recordLookups.label: Get Organization

validationRule.errorMessage: Date of Contact cannot be in the future.

fields.name: Create_Meeting
fields.helpText: Check this field to create a Meeting record after saving this contact report.

fields.helpText: Check this field to create a task after saving this contact report.

fields.helpText: Check this field to mark this task as Completed.

validationRule.errorMessage: End Date/Time can't be before Start Date/Time.

fields.name: NotContactOrOrgError
fields.fieldText: This screen flow can only be triggered from a Constituent or Organization record. Reach out to your Salesforce Administrator for more details.
